thread.title: BRIEF-India's Edelweiss Financial Services Dec Qtr Consol Profit Up 52 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Edelweiss Financial Services Dec Qtr Consol Profit Up 52 Pct

organizations.name: edelweiss financial services dec qtr consol

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Edelweiss Financial Services Ltd :
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 2.36 BILLION RUPEES * SAYS DECLARED AN INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 1.05 RUPEES PER SHARE
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL TOTAL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 20.69 BILLION RUPEES
* CONSOL NET PROFIT IN DEC QUARTER LAST YEAR WAS 1.55 BILLION RUPEES; CONSOL TOTAL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS WAS 16.05 BILLION RUPEES Source text - bit.ly/2F7dL9b Further company coverage:
